title: Multiple Choice (1 point each)
instructions: Select the best answer for each question.

prompts.question: Which of the following is NOT a reason we use source control?
What type of source control are we using in class?
Which of the following is NOT a part of the core game loop?
Every version of a game at retail is considered a(n) what?
What is the PRIMARY reason developers release console exclusives?
answers: Ensure more sales of a specific console
Reduce development costs by targeting a single platform
